channel.title: Home
channel.description: The Joy of Sharing and Learning Together

item.title: Yahoo Stock Quote module sample
item.description:
This article shows the Yahoo Stock Quote module in action.

Please enter some symbols on the left delimited by comma e.g.

  • GOOG, MSFT, YHOO
  • ^NYA,^IXIC,^N225
item.author: kksou@kksou.com (kksou)

item.title: Side Bar Menu Apple style - sample
item.description: This page shows the "Side Bar Menu Apple style module" live in action.
item.author: kksou@kksou.com (kksou)

item.title: Accordion Menu Apple style module - sample
item.description:
This page shows the "Accordion Menu Apple style module" live in action.

The menu is exactly the same as that in this page, except now the menu appears in a module position on the left.

Download the Accordion Menu Apple style module here.
item.author: kksou@kksou.com (kksou)

item.title: Accordion Menu Apple style - variation 2
item.description:
This is variation 2 of the Accordion Menu Apple style by changing the css file.

{Accordion_Menu_Apple_style 100 float:right16 revealtype:mouseover css:AccordionMenuApplestyle_v2.css} Test1 - test1.1 - test1.2 - test1.3 - test1.4 Test2 - test2.1 - test2.2 Test3 - test3.1 - test3.2 - test3.3 {/Accordion_Menu_Apple_style}

Highlights

  • Level 2 menus are now preceded by a star.

  • Level 2 menus are now in Times New Roman italics.
item.author: kksou@kksou.com (kksou)

item.title: Accordion Menu Apple style - module variation 2
item.description:
This page shows the "Accordion Menu Apple style module" live in action.

The menu is exactly the same as that of Accordion Menu Apple style - variation 2, except now the menu appears in a module position on the left.

Download the Accordion Menu Apple style module here.
item.author: kksou@kksou.com (kksou)

item.title: Accordion Menu Apple style - variation 1
item.description:
This is variation 1 of the Accordion Menu Apple style by changing the css file.

{Accordion_Menu_Apple_style 100 float:right16 revealtype:mouseover css:AccordionMenuApplestyle_v1.css} Test1 - test1.1 - test1.2 - test1.3 - test1.4 Test2 - test2.1 - test2.2 Test3 - test3.1 - test3.2 - test3.3 {/Accordion_Menu_Apple_style}

Highlights

  • No colored background bar for level 1 menus.

  • Level 1 menus are now preceded by a triangle.
item.author: kksou@kksou.com (kksou)

item.title: Accordion Menu Apple style - module variation 1
item.description:
This page shows the "Accordion Menu Apple style module" live in action.

The menu is exactly the same as that of Accordion Menu Apple style - variation 1, except now the menu appears in a module position on the left.

Note that the only modification I've made in the css file is to comment the following line so that it doesn't draw a border around the menu:

/*border: 1px solid #9A9A9A;*/

Download the Accordion Menu Apple style module here.
item.author: kksou@kksou.com (kksou)

item.title: Yahoo Stock Quote in content item - sample 2
item.description:
You can include the Yahoo Stock Quote module in an article or content item as shown below.

Yahoo Stock Quote

The following uses Layout style 2 which lists each symbol data by row.

Note: The auto refresh in this example has not been turned on. This is to prevent overloading the yahoo server when there are too many users running this example all at the same time.


{mosloadposition joomla03_2}
item.author: kksou@kksou.com (kksou)

item.title: Yahoo Stock Quote in content item - sample 1
item.description:
You can include the Yahoo Stock Quote module in an article or content item as shown below.

Yahoo Stock Quote

The following uses Layout style 1 which lists each symbol data by column.

Note: The auto refresh in this example has not been turned on. This is to prevent overloading the yahoo server when there are too many users running this example all at the same time.

{mosloadposition joomla03_1}
item.author: kksou@kksou.com (kksou)

item.title: Yahoo Currency Converter in content item - sample 3
item.description:
You can include the Yahoo Currency Converter module in an article or content item as shown below.

Yahoo Currency Converter

The following uses Layout style 3 - everything shows in one line.

{mosloadposition joomla02_3}
item.author: kksou@kksou.com (kksou)

item.title: Yahoo Currency Converter in content item - sample 2
item.description:

Yahoo Currency Converter

The following uses Layout style 2 - which is the same as that used in Google Finance.

{mosloadposition joomla02_2}
